newsitem.title: USA: US to sell $29.5 bln 2-, 5-yr notes April 22, 23.
newsitem.headline: US to sell $29.5 bln 2-, 5-yr notes April 22, 23.

text.p: The Treasury Department said on Wednesday that it will sell $17 billion of 2-year notes on April 22 and $12.5 bln of 5-yr notes on April 23 to refund $28.449 billion of securities maturing April 30 and to raise $1.05 billion of new cash.
The notes will be issued on April 30. The two-year notes mature on April 30, 1999 and the five-year notes mature on April 30, 2002.
The CUSIP number for the 2-year notes will be 9128272R2 and for the five-year notes will be 9128272S0.
